definitions.definition: before
examples: para afatit

definitions.definition: ago
examples: para dy shekujsh

definitions.definition: ( physical position ) in front of
examples: para një pasqyre

definitions.definition: ( presence ) in front of , in the presence of
examples: para klasës

secondary_definitions: ago
( physical position ) in front of
( presence ) in front of , in the presence of

definitions.definition: for
examples: Para sain ini?

definitions.definition: because of
examples: Para kaiyan?

definitions.definition: for
for ( directed at, intended to belong to )
for ( to obtain )
to , toward ( indicating destination )
for ( by the standards of )
( after a form of estar ) about to

main_definition: for ( directed at, intended to belong to )
secondary_definitions: for ( to obtain )
to , toward ( indicating destination )
for ( by the standards of )
( after a form of estar ) about to

definitions.definition: for ; on behalf of
for ; to ( expressing a recipient )
examples: Hanuka linda sta aki; ocho kandelas para mi.

definitions.definition: to ; in order to ; so ; for ( expressing the intended purpose of an action )
toward ; moving in the direction of

secondary_definitions: to ; in order to ; so ; for ( expressing the intended purpose of an action )
toward ; moving in the direction of

definitions.definition: for ( directed at, intended to belong to or to be appropriate for )
examples: Ração para gatos.
O que é bom para gripe?

definitions.definition: indicates application of an adjective ; to
to ; so ; in order to ( indicates purpose )
examples: Comprei um baixo para tocar numa banda.

definitions.definition: towards ; to ; in the direction of ( indicates destination )
examples: Vamos para a minha casa.

definitions.definition: introduces the location, direction or context that applies to a verb
examples: Essa janela abre para um longo vale.

definitions.definition: to ( to the value of )
examples: A cor da banana mudou de amarelo para preto.
O valor da minha casa baixou para menos do que o que eu paguei.

definitions.definition: in the opinion of; to (someone)
examples: Para mim, este livro é um dos melhores da história.

definitions.definition: ( with an infinitive ) about to ; soon to be ( indicates that something will happen soon )
examples: Fiquem quietos que o filme está para começar.

main_definition: for ( directed at, intended to belong to or to be appropriate for )
secondary_definitions: indicates application of an adjective ; to
to ; so ; in order to ( indicates purpose )
towards ; to ; in the direction of ( indicates destination )
introduces the location, direction or context that applies to a verb
to ( to the value of )
in the opinion of; to (someone)
( with an infinitive ) about to ; soon to be ( indicates that something will happen soon )

definitions.definition: for , to ( expressing a recipient )
examples: La niña compró un regalo de navidad para su abuela.
Ahora me gustaría hacer un truco de magia para ustedes.

definitions.definition: to , in order to , so , for ( expressing the intended purpose of an action )
examples: Estudio cada noche sin descanso para conseguir un trabajo decente al fin de todo esto.
Voy a salir temprano para evitar el tráfico.

definitions.definition: by , due , due on , due by ( expressing a deadline )
examples: Necesito tu decisión para fin de mes.
Sus proyectos de grupo son para el viernes sin excepción.

definitions.definition: for ( expressing contrast from what is expected )
examples: Para un turista americano, él es en realidad bastante respetuoso.

definitions.definition: for , to , in one's opinion , as far as one is concerned ( expressing an opinion , perception or perspective )
examples: Para mí, la música es lo único bueno sobre esa película.
Para mi hermano, su esposa tiene toda la razón.

definitions.definition: for ( expressing using one's efforts for a group or an authority figure such as a sports team or a company/boss )
examples: Mi sobrino juega para el equipo de los Patos Poderosos.
Trabajamos para la misma jefe aunque no al mismo tiempo.
Ella trabajó para Microsoft durante años, pero ahora trabaja para Apple.

definitions.definition: come ( used to indicate a point in time at or after which a stated event or situation occurs )
examples: Para septiembre, me estaré quedando atrás.

secondary_definitions: to , in order to , so , for ( expressing the intended purpose of an action )
by , due , due on , due by ( expressing a deadline )
for ( expressing contrast from what is expected )
for , to , in one's opinion , as far as one is concerned ( expressing an opinion , perception or perspective )
for ( expressing using one's efforts for a group or an authority figure such as a sports team or a company/boss )
come ( used to indicate a point in time at or after which a stated event or situation occurs )

definitions.definition: for
examples: Nagtatrabaho si Ate Virgie para sa kanyang pamilya.
